snippet.title: The Rise of the Golden Idol - Official Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
The Award-winning detective saga returns. Coming November 12th to PC, PlayStation, Switch, Xbox and Mobile via Netflix. 

WISHLIST: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2716400

Uncover the truth behind 20 strange cases of crime, death and depravity in the 1970s. The world has changed dramatically - the sins of humanity have not.
